channel.title: Npc emotes help
channel.description:
Hello, im working on a littel mini game, then i found out my npc attacking style is bugged then i found out the ids i need to fix it but i have no idea where i shall add it and how i add it ? can you help me with fix then my npc attack me i wanna set a emote and then i block my attack i need an emote then it dies i need a emote. I hope you can help me.
~~ Yorchi
